title: The remaines of the Right Honorable Francis, Lord Verulam, Viscount of St. Albanes, sometimes Lord Chancellour of England being essayes and severall letters to severall great personages, and other pieces of various and high concernment not heretofore published : a table whereof for the readers more ease is adjoyned.
author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.
publisher: Printed by B. Alsop for Lawrence Chapman, and are to be sold at his shop ...,
